entry.title: SUBLIMATION Water Bottle with Bamboo Lid - White
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 9.95

These tumblers are suitable for sublimation. Please ensure that you have selected the correct tumblers. We carry both regular and sublimation ready in the same styles. 

These double-walled stainless steel water bottles with bamboo wood lids are great for summer parties or wedding party gifts. Customize with sublimation or adhesive PSV vinyl by Siser!

Perfect for your hot and cold 

600ml 

DISCLAIMER: Hand-wash only and do not soak,

entry.title: SUBLIMATION 20oz SKINNY Tumbler - White
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 10.95 - 250.00 (2 variants)

These tumblers are suitable for sublimation. Please ensure that you have selected the correct tumblers. We carry both regular and sublimation ready in the same styles. 

Includes Stainless steel straw and straw cleaning brush! (not pictured)

These double-walled stainless steel tumblers with lids are great for summer parties or wedding party gifts. Customize with adhesive PSV vinyl by Siser!

The 20oz size lids feature a sliding lid for an option to close it. The cup can also be used without a lid. 

Each 20oz sublimation tumbler includes a plastic reusable straw.

Perfect for your hot and cold 

DISCLAIMER: Hand-wash only and do NOT let lids soak, do not pour boiling water over them. Plastic lids will not last as long as stainless steel tumblers and replacement lids are available. Dishwashing the lids will cause hazing and cracking of the lids. Metal may scratch if pressed with a sharp object.
